text: Gerald Hiken (May 27, 1927 - January 6, 2021) was an American actor. He was born in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Hiken was nominated for a Tony Award in 1980 for his role in Strider. He was in The Candidate (1972), Reds (1981), and Fat Man and Little Boy (1989). Hiken died on January 6, 2021 in San Francisco, California at the age of 93.Gerald Hiken (1927-2021) ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Milwaukee
title: Gerald Hiken
